name: Fast Food Delivery Simulator
description:
"Fast Food Delivery Simulator 3D" is an open world simulation game.

Deliver fast foods to customers on time. Collect stars for extra score and time. You can drive parking cars and deliver faster!

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive simulation game.

Suitable for children and all ages. Enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends circle.
